msg: FLUME-1126. Support RFC 3164 and 5424 syslog formats

author: jfthomps
msg: images.php: modified AJsubmitSetImageProduction - added resRefresh() call to returned javascript so page contents get refreshed to make reservation that was ended disappear
itecsauth.php: modified updateITECSUser - commented out adding user to demo group
privileges.js: modified focusFirstNode - fixed to work with dojo 1.6; added code to expand all parents of focused node if they are not already expanded (can happen if tree saved cookie is erased)
vcl.css: changed .privtreeselected color from black to white to make it show up better

author: jfthomps
msg: utils.php: modified allocComputer - moved initial declaration of fromblock from array definition to inside each foreach so the last return would return an empty array if no computers were found
